trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section that defines settings that can be used by an administrator for run-time inspection and control.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態區段，定義可由系統管理員用於執行階段檢查和控制的設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.DiagnosticSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.DiagnosticSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the End-to-End tracing configuration settings specified in a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.EndToEndTracingElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.EndToEndTracingElement" /> 執行個體中所指定的端對端追蹤組態設定值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.EndToEndTracingElement" />, which contains End-to-End tracing configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.EndToEndTracingElement" />，包含端對端追蹤組態設定值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the Event-Tracing provider, which writes events to ETW sessions.
trans-unit.target: 取得寫入事件至 ETW 工作階段之「事件追蹤」提供者的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Describes the settings for [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] message logging.
trans-unit.target: 描述 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 訊息記錄的設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MessageLoggingElement" /> that describes the settings for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] message logging.
trans-unit.target: 描述 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MessageLoggingElement" /> 訊息記錄的設定的 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether performance counters for the assembly are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否為組件啟用效能計數器。

trans-unit.source: A valid <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterScope" /> value that specifies what kind of performance counters for the assembly are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterScope" /> 值，指定為組件啟用何種效能計數器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the WMI provider for the assembly is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否為組件啟用 WMI 提供者。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the WMI provider for the assembly is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果為組件啟用 WMI 提供者，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The WMI provider is required for users to gain runtime access to the inspection and control features of [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 使用者需要 WMI 提供者來取得 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 的檢查和控制功能的執行階段存取權。
